data.message: Can you remove the banner on my profile that says "Remembering Keisha Rose. We hope people who love Keisha will find comfort....."? I'm not dead and it's freaking people out.

replies.message: Hi Keisha. For a brief period today, a message meant for memorialized profiles was mistakenly posted to other accounts. This was a terrible error that we have now fixed and worked quickly to resolve. Thanks for taking the time to report the issues and hope that no one was too affected by the problem! -Jessica
